transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji hello. Ji hello. Sarik Sarik sir good evening. Amit baat kar raha tha sir main IndiaMART office Noida se. Anjali ji ke senior bane sir. Sir aapki profile hai SK Handicraft ki. Anjali ki aaj morning mein aapse baat hui hai sir. Aapne ek feedback hame diya hua hai whatsapp ke through.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To main jaan sakta hu kahan dikkat aa rahi hai sir. Anjali ki aaj proper aapse baat bhi hui hai. Koi dikkat hai sir Anjali ki taraf se?
Customer: Nahi baat mein wo dobara baat ho gayi thi meri unse sir. Wo to kal ka feedback matlab kal baat hui thi. Fir uske baad aaj baat ho gayi hai.
Executive: To abhi aapko koi issue koi problem to nahi hai na sir uske bihaf mein. Kyunki feedback jo aapne diya wo Anjali ke le liya sir.
Customer: Nahi to wo to message aaya tha to ho gaya hoga. Jaldi mein bhi ungli lag jati hai wo to sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha. To ek kaam karta hu sir agar koi issue nahi hai to main aapka ye concern jo hai sir jo feedback aapne diya usko close kar deta hu. Wo Anjali ke liye.
Customer: Wo wala feedback. Ji ji. Aapko ek baar abhi aapko jayega na to please satisfied kar dijiyega sir hai na. Baki Anjali aapko whatsapp pe connect pe hai sir. Aap usko kabhi bhi kuch lage aap contact kar sakte hai sir.
Executive: Ha lekin jo unhe maine diya tha abhi unhone aaj thoda kiya hai lekin abhi issue to jaise notification wala.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Ha sir wo notification wala abhi milke kar payenge hum log kyuki wo unke side se hona hai to aap unko directly contact karenge na sir to jyada achcha rehta hai. Hai na. To baki main aapko unka number hai na aapke paas save hai sir aap Anjali IndiaMART ke naam se save kar lo sir.
Customer: Thik hai save hai.
Executive: Thik hai baki main aapka concern close kar deta hu aapka feedback jayega please aap satisfied kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had given negative feedback.

- Issue with notification not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive called to address the feedback.

- Suggested to contact Anjali directly for notification issue.

- Executive will close the feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer needs to provide a satisfactory feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, notification, contact
